short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that displays a random joke in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome browser extension that displays a random funny joke in a popup. You should install this extension to get jokes that uplift your mood no matter where you are and what you are doing. Have fun!
